snippet.title: Bridge Tactics | Walkthrough/Gameplay (Full Game) [No Commentary]
snippet.description:
Bridge Tactics is a super addictive destruction game. The aim of "Bridge Tactics" is to place sticks of dynamite in the right spots and detonate them to bring down the bridge. Simply click with your left mouse button to put the dynamites, then hit Ready button to send in the enemy army.

To the viewers watching this video, I hope you enjoyed it as much as I enjoyed playing the game! Don't forget to like this, add it to your favorites playlist, share it with a friend, leave a comment, and subscribe to my YouTube channel for more fantastic gaming videos!!
